/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the towering buildings that line the street. These structures, primarily made of concrete and glass, rise high into the sky, their facades reflecting the sunlight. The street itself is a hive of activity, with cars and pedestrians adding life to the scene. The colors in the image are predominantly blue, green, and gray, painting a picture of a city that is both vibrant and serene.
